column4: I'm needing to code a custom (quite basic) app to make outgoing voip calls to landlines/mobiles. I found sipsimple which is an extensive Python library but just wanted to ask if there was a better solution (ie shortcut).
This is not really the best place to ask. Maybe you could try somewhere else.
hmm ok. I've racked my brain over where "somewhere else" could be. I thought perhaps Ekiga, Empathy, etc may provide a way to do what I need
I have no knowledge over the subject. Sorry :(
